content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "1/2 cup white sugar" )
( ing-2 "1 tablespoon baking powder" )
( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-4 "1 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-5 "1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg" )
( ing-6 "1 cup milk" )
( ing-7 "1 egg, beaten" )
( ing-8 "1/4 cup butter, melted and cooled" )
( ing-9 "2 teaspoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-10 "2 quarts oil for deep frying" )
( ing-11 "1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-12 "1/2 cup white sugar" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, stir together the flour, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, salt, 1 teaspoon of cinnamon and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@34:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1/2 cup sugar"@45:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking powder"@60:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@75:79 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "1 teaspoon of cinnamon"@81:103 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "nutmeg"@108:114 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:_result ( flour-mixture )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg, butter, and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Make"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "a well"@8:14 / OTHER )
		:loc ( "the center"@18:28 / FOOD )
		:_result ( well-in-flour )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "pour in"@33:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the milk"@41:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "egg"@51:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "butter"@56:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "vanilla"@68:75 / FOOD )
		:gol ( well-in-flour / FOOD )
		:_result ( dough-with-milk-egg )
	)
)

( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( dough-with-milk-egg / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until well blended"@7:25 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( well-blended-dough )
	)
)

( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( well-blended-dough / FOOD )
		:_result ( covered-dough )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "refrigerate"@13:24 / AC
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "1 hour"@29:35 / DUR )
		:ppt ( covered-dough / FOOD )
		:_result ( regfrigerated-dough )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Heat oil in a deep heavy skillet or deep-fryer to 370 degrees F (185 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:mnr ( temp-4-0 "370 degrees F"@53:66 / TEMPERATURE )
		:mnr ( temp-4-1 "185 degrees C"@68:81 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:option ( tool-4-0 "a deep heavy skillet"@15:35 / TOOL )
			:option ( tool-4-1 "deep-fryer"@39:49 / TOOL )
		)
		:_result ( hot-oil )
	)
)

content.text: 5) On a floured board, roll chilled dough out to 1/2 inch thickness.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "roll"@23:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a floured board"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( regfrigerated-dough "chilled dough"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:product ( "1/2 inch thickness"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
		:_result ( rolled-dough )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Use a 3 inch round cutter to cut out doughnuts.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "cut out"@32:39 / AC
		:ppt ( rolled-dough / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-6-0 "a 3 inch round cutter"@7:28 / TOOL )
		:product ( "doughnuts"@40:49 / FOOD )
		:_result ( doughnuts )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Use a smaller cutter to cut holes from center.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "cut"@27:30 / AC
		:product ( "holes"@31:36 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( doughnuts "center"@42:48 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-7-0 "a smaller cutter"@7:23 / TOOL )
		:_result ( hollowed-doughnuts )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Fry doughnuts in hot oil until golden brown, turning once.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Fry"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( hollowed-doughnuts "doughnuts"@7:16 / FOOD )
		:loc ( hot-oil "hot oil"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until golden brown"@28:46 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:simultaneous ( ac-8-1 "turning"@48:55 / AC
			:ppt ( hollowed-doughnuts / FOOD )
		)
		:_result ( fried-doughnuts )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Remove from oil to drain on paper plates.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Remove"@4:10 / AC
		:source ( hot-oil "oil"@16:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( hollowed-doughnuts / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to drain on paper plates"@20:44 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( drained-doughnuts )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Combine the remaining 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/2 cup sugar in a large resealable bag.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
   :inform ( ac-10-0 "Combine"@4:11 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-11 "the remaining 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon"@12:47 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-12 "1/2 cup sugar"@52:65 / FOOD )
      :loc ( tool-10-0 "a large resealable bag"@69:91 / TOOL )
	:_result bag-with-cinnamon-sugar
   )
)

content.text: 11) Place a few warm donuts into the bag at a time, seal and shake to coat.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Place"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( drained-doughnuts "a few warm donuts"@10:27 / FOOD )
		:gol ( bag-with-cinnamon-sugar "the bag"@33:40 / TOOL )
		:_result ( doughnuts-bag )
	)
	:inform ( ac-11-1 "seal"@52:56 / AC
		:ppt ( doughnuts-bag / TOOL )
		:_result ( sealed-bag )
	)
	:inform ( ac-11-2 "shake"@61:66 / AC
		:ppt ( sealed-bag / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-11-0 "to coat"@67:74 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
